mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (parker_id, parking_id, rsv_price, rsv_intime, rsv_outtime, rsv_datetime, rsv_states) values (#{parker_id}, #{parking_id}, #{rsv_price}, #{rsv_intime},#{rsv_outtime},NOW(), 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET rsv_states = #{rsv_states} WHERE rsv_id=#{rsv_id}
mapper.select: SELECT r.rsv_id, r.rsv_intime, r.rsv_outtime, r.rsv_price, r.parking_id, p.owner_id, p.parking_type, p.parking_title, p.parking_price, u.user_nickname, u.user_phone, c.car_num, c.car_type FROM reservation as r inner join parkingboard as p on r.parking_id = p.parking_id inner join user as u on r.parker_id = u.user_id left outer join carinfo as c on r.parker_id = c.user_id where r.rsv_id = #{rsv_id};
SELECT * FROM reservation as r inner join parkingboard as p on r.parking_id = p.parking_id inner join user as u on r.parker_id = u.user_id WHERE parker_id = #{parker_id} or owner_id = #{owner_id}
SELECT * FROM reservation as r inner join parkingboard as p on r.parking_id = p.parking_id inner join user as u on r.parker_id = u.user_id WHERE p.parking_id = #{parking_id} ORDER BY rsv_intime DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) From reservation where parking_id = #{parking_id} AND rsv_states < 2
